comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: I think this photo is mislabeled -- it should be Iron Pier. The confusion comes from Steele Pier in Atlantic City. In this photo of yours of Iron Pier, it looks the same: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/brooklyn_museum/5833494116/] There were two Iron Piers.. based on this page, I believe our photo is "New Iron Pier".

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On July 13, 2011, Rob Ketcherside suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Good catch, Rob -- thanks. We'll pass this on to curatorial and update our system.
